thread.section_title: Blueinsurance Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Blueinsurance | blueinsurance.ie
thread.title: Morgan Doyle

author: Morgan Doyle
title: Morgan Doyle
text:
I use blue ins for my annual travel insurance.
It's so simple I get my reminder email close to the date.
Whenever I have 5 Mins grab my credit card make the call all done and dusted and all confirmed by email couldn't be simpler.
Never had any reason to make any type of claim thank God with some luck I never will.
But let's hope if I ever do that it will be as easy.
Morgan Doyle
